rooms.name: Deluxe Room
rooms.description: A spacious room with ocean view, king-size bed, and modern amenities.

rooms.name: Standard Room
rooms.description: A cozy room with a city view, queen-size bed, and all essential amenities.

rooms.name: Suite Room
rooms.description: A luxurious suite with a large living area, separate bedroom, and a stunning panoramic view.

rooms.name: Single Room
rooms.description: A budget-friendly room with a single bed and essential amenities for solo travelers.

rooms.name: Penthouse
rooms.description: A top-floor penthouse with a private terrace, hot tub, and a breathtaking city view.

rooms.name: Family Suite
rooms.description: A spacious suite with two bedrooms, a living area, and a fully-equipped kitchen.

rooms.name: Beachfront Room
rooms.description: A room right by the beach, with direct access to the shoreline, king-size bed, and a private balcony.

rooms.name: Garden View Room
rooms.description: A peaceful room with a beautiful view of the hotel's garden, queen-size bed, and a work desk.

rooms.name: Business Suite
rooms.description: A room designed for business travelers with a work desk, high-speed internet, and a comfortable bed.

rooms.name: Executive Room
rooms.description: An upscale room with an executive desk, leather chairs, and access to the lounge.
